TAYLOR 💬 Lauren's (Hemp) close, back training with us last couple of days so we’ll give her another 24 hours. The temptation is to want to have these players back, same with Vicky (Losada).  #ManCity
TAYLOR 💬 We're looking forward to (playing at home). The support has been amazing at home and away. That's been a big thing for us and the players, the importance of our supporters.  #ManCity
TAYLOR 💬 [On Brighton] They're a difficult team to play against. They've been in some high scoring games. There are no easy games in the @BarclaysWSL.  #ManCity
TAYLOR 💬 The game’s won in both boxes, we’ve had Bunny (Shaw) contributing with good numbers and we’ve been pretty frugal at the other end which is important for any team to be successful.  #ManCity

ALVAREZ 💬 Yeah, when I knew I might be coming here I had a chat with him (Aguero). I had regular contact over a six-month period with him and other international players who played here. What the city is like, what it’s like to get around.   #ManCity

ALVAREZ 💬 He (Aguero) did amazing performances and lots of great goals... the fans were great with him and they have been great with me too. I want to put in 100% effort and hopefully, I will have a great time here like him.  #ManCity
ALVAREZ 💬 The best players in the world play in this competition. I always wanted to be here. I am happy to be learning and giving my best, helping the side wherever I can.  #ManCity
PEP 💬 He (Palmer) trained after the game and he trained really well.  #ManCity

PEP 💬 He (Phillips) is doing partial sessions with the team. Contact not yet but we will see his evolution. We know how important the World Cup is but we can't use a player who is not ready. My feeling now is it will be tight.  #ManCity
PEP 💬 He (Haaland) feels better compared to Saturday and Sunday. But not 100%, we don't want to take a risk, it makes no sense. Hopefully, he will be back for Fulham.   #ManCity
PEP 💬 For tomorrow he (Haaland) is not available.   #ManCity

PEP 💬 (It is a) fantastic atmosphere and stadium, I'm happy to come back here. Three years ago we came back in Covid times. It was one of my best times at Manchester City, when we won here and went to the semi-finals of the Champions League.   #ManCity

PEP 💬 Gundogan was the first player we signed - when I became a manager to have the pleasure to work with people like Ilkay. I will never forget him... he is an incredible football player, always grounded... and always you can rely on him 100%. He gave us the PL.  #ManCity

PEP 💬 He (Haaland) is so smart. A part of that is his work ethic. He is one of the first to arrive, like Rúben, and one of the last to leave. He looks after his body perfectly. He is well educated in the way he has to live as a professional.  #ManCity

PEP 💬 They are always a tough opponent. In important games, they behave at the top level. It will not be easy tomorrow, we have a lot of respect for them... we know we have to behave and be at our best to beat them, there is no doubt about that.   #ManCity

DIAS 💬 It will be my first time in this stadium... For every player to play in this kind of environment, it is what we want - to play on the big stages and big games. It will be special for all of us. I hope we can win first of all and I hope we can put on a good show.  #ManCity

DIAS 💬 These days it (a routine) is of extreme importance because the demand is high. We are playing every three days at a high level. Your mission is to be available to the coach at your maximum potential.  #ManCity

Follow our open training session ahead of our #UCL clash with FC Copenhagen  💪  Watch live ⬇️

SERGIO GOMEZ 💬 (On playing in the derby) I have always been a City fan, so for me it is a dream come true. I used to watch the games with my brother back in the day. I am aware how important it was and I am delighted we won.   #ManCity
SERGIO GOMEZ 💬 (On working with Pep) It’s a dream to be trained by him and I made my dream come true. I learn a lot in training, meetings and when we chat. I like the advice he gives me.   #ManCity

SERGIO GOMEZ 💬 It is true when you come to a big club it can be hard, but I am happy with my adaptation to City. The players and staff helped me. I'll work hard to play more, will train harder and make things difficult for Pep to choose the starting XI.  #ManCity
𝗣𝗟𝗔𝗬𝗘𝗥'𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗘𝗩𝗜𝗘𝗪  @sergiogm_10 answers questions from the press ahead of our #UCL clash 💬  Watch live 👇
PEP 💬 (On whether Phillips will play before the World Cup) I hope so. I hope for him and the national team. But I am not a physio - the doctor told me he is doing good.   #ManCity

PEP 💬 We know how important our games at home are and tomorrow will be no exception. When I face this kind of team from Northern Europe, they are always really good. We have to be careful. If we can win three games, we will be so close to going through to the next stage.
PEP 💬 He (Foden) is an exceptional player. He has grown up a lot and is reliable in terms of his physical condition. Every three days he can play.   #ManCity
PEP 💬 We will train this afternoon and we will know exactly. Rodri feels better, Kyle (Walker) I think is out. But we have training later.  #ManCity

PEP 💬 They (Sevilla) won't be concerned with just defending. We have to be prepared because they will be aggressive. This competition is played with a lot of enthusiasm. More so in a stadium like this one. We have to be prepared for that. We have to crank up the pace.   #ManCity

PEP 💬 We fought a lot to be here, so now we try to enjoy it. Always teams in Spain are so tough. They have dominated in the last 15 years... We try and do a good game and get the three points.  #ManCity

PEP 💬  (On why Walker and Stones are absent) Injured.  (On if serious injuries) John is not much. Kyle is not much too, but I don't know if he will be ready for Saturday, or Dortmund or Wolves before the international break.  #ManCity https://t.co/YJnfHBdG2H

RODRIGO 💬 Keep doing what we have been doing - playing our own football. We have to impose our style. To play an abrasive team like Sevilla, we have to be at our best and focus on ourselves. They have their weapons. We are looking tactically at how to approach them.   #ManCity

RODRIGO 💬  I think we had a great start. Obviously, we have two draws but we know how tough the Premier League is. Look at the results, no one is winning easy. We know it is like this. We want to improve every day.  #ManCity

RODRIGO 💬 They have a great manager - he works really well - and Sevilla have great players, it’s true a few players have left but they are always a competitive team, especially at home. They will be attacking all the time...  #ManCity https://t.co/UhZ3xPTFNb

PEP 💬 Nathan and Jack trained yesterday and trained really well. Kalvin not yet but we'll see in the last session today.

PEP 💬 (On Manuel Akanji) We had a chance to bring someone with one year left on his deal. He is fast and really good in the buildup. We saw this when we faced Dortmund three seasons ago. We are glad he is here.

PEP 💬 Yes we had an incredible four central defenders before Manuel. Aymeric has a tough injury and is still a month, month and a half away, and Nathan still has muscular problems. So we could not face this busy schedule with just two central defenders.
